meanings.definition: Drive (someone) in a car as a chauffeur.
meanings.sent1: She chauffeured her boss to the airport.
meanings.sent2: The chauffeur chauffeured the guests to the wedding venue.
meanings.sent3: The cat chauffeured the mouse around in a toy car.
meanings.sent4: His words chauffeured her thoughts to a distant memory.
meanings.sent5: The sun chauffeured the clouds across the sky.

meanings.definition: Transport (someone) in a car as a chauffeur.
meanings.sent1: He chauffeured his friends to the concert.
meanings.sent2: The chauffeur chauffeured the family to the amusement park.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel chauffeured the acorn in a tiny car.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter chauffeured joy into the room.
meanings.sent5: The river chauffeured the fallen leaves downstream.
